# Recommended GitHub Topics

Add these topics to your repository settings on GitHub to improve discoverability:

## Primary Topics (Must Have)
- `android`
- `video-downloader`
- `media-cache`
- `offline-viewing`

## Secondary Topics (Highly Recommended)
- `short-drama`
- `video-streaming`
- `android-app`
- `media-player`
- `video-cache`

## Technology Topics (Based on your tech stack)
- `kotlin` or `java` (depending on your implementation)
- `android-development`
- `mobile-app`

## Additional Topics
- `open-source`
- `video`
- `download`
- `cache`
- `offline`

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About"
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics listed above
4. Press Enter after each topic
5. Click "Save changes"

---

# 推荐的 GitHub 主题标签

在 GitHub 仓库设置中添加这些主题标签以提高可发现性：

## 主要主题（必须）
- `android`
- `video-downloader`
- `media-cache`
- `offline-viewing`

## 次要主题（强烈推荐）
- `short-drama`
- `video-streaming`
- `android-app`
- `media-player`
- `video-cache`

## 技术主题（根据您的技术栈）
- `kotlin` 或 `java`（取决于您的实现）
- `android-development`
- `mobile-app`

## 其他主题
- `open-source`
- `video`
- `download`
- `cache`
- `offline`

## 如何添加主题

1. 在 GitHub 上打开您的仓库
2. 点击 "About" 旁边的齿轮图标（⚙️）
3. 在 "Topics" 字段中，添加上面列出的主题
4. 每个主题后按 Enter
5. 点击 "Save changes"
